articles.title: Hubble Space Telescope Detects Protective Shield Defending a Pair of Dwarf Galaxies - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Researchers confirm the existence of the elusive Magellanic Corona, a protective halo of hot, ionized gas previously known only in theory. For billions of years, the Milky Way’s most massive cosmic companions – the Large and Small Magellanic Clouds – have bee…
articles.content:

articles.title: When is October's partial solar eclipse and who can see it? - Space.com
articles.description: Just before Halloween 2022, the sun will appear as if a monstrous bite has been taken from it as the moon's shadow falls on parts of the Earth.
articles.content:
